item.title: Review: Remarkable2 e-ink (paper) tablet
item.description: My reMarkable2 order including paper/e-ink tablet, folio case with marker plus (above). Some links may include referral or affiliate links but only positive reviews will do this. Otherwise no links are provided to the product. Agenda Since this is the first review I am writing for public consumption of a product I wanted to make sure I provided the background of my purchase upfront including:
